tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Al-Muddaththir, Ayah 8?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: He imagines that as he is well-to-do in this world, he will fare well in the Hereafter also. But with the advent of Doomsday, the whole situation will change
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse explains the rules of inheritance

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: In order to cover up their rejection, they try to find defects in the discourse of the preacher of Truth. The greatest impediment to acceptance of the Truth is a man’s egoism or pride
distractors: This verse explains the rules of inheritance
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse describes the characteristics of believers

tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The conditions of hell described in the Quran relate to the unseen and hidden world. There being nineteen angels in hell is also a fact of a similar nature
distractors: This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse describes the characteristics of believers

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Al-Muddaththir, Ayah 32?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: They will avoid all actions which could plunge them into Hell, prefering instead to act in a way which will lead them to Paradise. The earth rotates on its axis and the moon orbits the earth
distractors: This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse explains the rules of inheritance
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets

tafsirQuiz.question: What deeper meaning is explained in this verse?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Advice, howsoever reasonable and well-supported by arguments, can be effective only when the hearer is serious about it. If the hearer is not serious, the advice will not reach his heart
distractors: This verse addresses only legal rulings
This verse focuses on scientific facts
This verse is primarily about historical events
